name: Forsekir:First Invasion
detailed_description: Forsekir: First Invasion is a story and mission-oriented open-world RPG set in a visually impressive fantasy universe. Forsekir is set in a vast open world full of merchant cities, impressive dynamic weather, glaciers, dangerous canyons and caves waiting to be explored. Help to take back the kingdom, besieged by half-man and half-orcs.
about_the_game: Forsekir: First Invasion is a story and mission-oriented open-world RPG set in a visually impressive fantasy universe. Forsekir is set in a vast open world full of merchant cities, impressive dynamic weather, glaciers, dangerous canyons and caves waiting to be explored. Help to take back the kingdom, besieged by half-man and half-orcs.
short_description: Complete the missions given to you to take back the kingdom that is besieged by some dangerous races. Don't forget your horse and your favorite sword!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GT 720 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7850
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: HD Audio driver
  • Additional Notes: Any Audio driver
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 770 / AMD GPU Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: HD Audio driver
  • Additional Notes: Any Audio driver
